docs.snippet: In the latest flare-up of tensions between California and Washington, President Trump criticized the governor for granting the pardons.

headline.print_headline: Trump Assails Pardons  Given to 5 Immigrants By California Governor
headline.main: Jerry Brown Pardons 5 Ex-Convicts Facing Deportation, Provoking Trump

docs.snippet: I was a Bush-era political analyst at Sinclair. Its propaganda was bad then, and it’s getting only worse.

headline.print_headline: With Sinclair, We Have Trump TV. America Doesn’t Need More.
headline.main: With Sinclair, We Have Trump TV. America Doesn’t Need More.

docs.snippet: By tying a trade deal with South Korea to progress in denuclearizing Pyongyang, President Trump is pressuring an ally hoping it will help him deal with a reclusive foe.

headline.print_headline: Trump, Lacking Leverage Over North Korea, Takes Aim at South Instead
headline.main: Trump, Lacking Leverage Over North Korea, Takes Aim at South Instead

docs.snippet: In his first visit as president to California, President Trump attacked the Democratic governor and called on Congress to punish jurisdictions that do not cooperate with federal immigration authorities.

headline.print_headline: Trump Calls California ‘Out of Control’ and Assails the Governor
headline.main: In California, Trump Attacks Jerry Brown and ‘Sanctuary Policies’

docs.snippet: A 15-year-old stood up to the Parkland gunman, yet the president won’t stand up to the N.R.A.

headline.print_headline: Mr. Trump, Here’s a Hero; It’s Your Turn!
headline.main: Mr. Trump, Here’s a Teenage Hero; It’s Your Turn!

docs.snippet: Since President Trump’s inauguration, staffers of the White House and federal agencies have left in firings and resignations, one after the other.

headline.main: Hired and Fired: The Unprecedented Turnover of the Trump Administration

docs.snippet: The president has remained in touch with Mr. Porter, the former White House staff secretary, since his resignation, according to people familiar with the conversations.

headline.print_headline: Trump Pines for an Aide Who Resigned
headline.main: Trump Talks of Bringing Back Rob Porter, Aide Accused of Spousal Abuse

docs.snippet: The president raises levies on foreign steel and aluminum in hopes of reviving fading domestic industries. But imports from Mexico and Canada will be spared for now.

headline.print_headline: Trump Signs Tariffs, Defying Array of Allies
headline.main: Trump Authorizes Tariffs, Defying Allies at Home and Abroad

docs.snippet: The United States used to stand up for human rights, but that was before the Trump administration.

headline.print_headline: Dictators Love Trump, and He Loves Them
headline.main: Dictators Love Trump, and He Loves Them

docs.snippet: The itinerary will include Peru, where President Trump will attend a summit meeting with leaders who have criticized his policies on immigration, and Colombia.

headline.print_headline: Trump to Make First Visit as President to Latin America
headline.main: Trump to Make First Visit as President to Latin America
